ygData.subject: Re: Fear Vs Spook the undead
ygData.msgSnippet: Fear is for things like animals and Spook the Undead (kinda sounds like a cartoon character, Spook the Undead!!!), is for Undead like things in Unrest.
ygData.messageBody:
Fear is for things like animals and Spook the Undead (kinda sounds like a
cartoon character, Spook the Undead!!!), is for Undead like things in
Unrest.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************

> From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>
> I am about to get fear. Can I still use Spook against the undead. Or will
> Fear be more successful.
>
> It's just that Fear takes 40 Mana while Spook takes just 10 Mana.
>
> Thanks
>
> Nynenom
> Rallos Zek
>
>
